main event: A pilot reported observing a 40 ft x 10 ft object moving at approximately 1500 mph over Williamson, West Virginia.
interesting points: The object left a vapor trail that was 45 degrees above and 1 mile in length and disappeared in approximately 1/2 second., The sighting was made by a civilian pilot from Capital Airlines., The report includes various headings and data points related to flight paths and altitudes., The object was visually confirmed by the pilot., This sighting is documented under the Project Blue Book record.
